original_text: Then Solomon counted all the resident aliens who were in the land of Israel, after the census of them that David his father had taken, and there were found 153,600.
korean_text: 전에 솔로몬의 아버지 다윗이 이스라엘 땅에 사는 이방 사람들을 조사하였더니 이제 솔로몬이 다시 조사하매 모두 십오만 삼천 육백 명이라

sentences.original_text: Then Solomon counted all the resident aliens
who were in the land of Israel
that David his father had taken
